risk.model

Class RiskPlayerModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • risk.model.RiskPlayerModel

  • public class RiskPlayerModel
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the model class of the Player. Player has a name, index, territories he occupies, and cards that he owns.
    Author:
    Team8
